document_data.name: Bly Ruldegost
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Bly Ruldegost''' was a proud and honorable member of the [[Knights of the Shield]]{{Cite web enhancement/Noble Houses of Waterdeep|6}}
document_data.Activities:
While Ruldegost attempted to recruit other [[Waterdeep|Waterdhavian]] nobles to his order, he did not believe in instituting a Knight of the Shield within the ranks of the [[Lords of Waterdeep]], which put him at odds with his superiors.

Lord Bly was the regent for his young nephew, [[Detan Ruldegost|Detan]].

He supported the creation of a new duchy in eastern [[Amn]], based in Riatavin, to be headed by Lord [[Mundal Krimmevol]], but desired Lord Mundal to become a member of the Knights and give assurance of increased trade links between Riatavin and the rest of Amn to the west.
